DocAttribute.Name: OverallWidth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Total extent of the width, defined parallel to the x axis of the position coordinate system.

DocAttribute.Name: OverallDepth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Total extent of the depth, defined parallel to the y axis of the position coordinate system.

DocAttribute.Name: WebThickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Thickness of the web of the I-shape. The web is centred on the x-axis and the y-axis of the position coordinate system.

DocAttribute.Name: FlangeThickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Flange thickness of the I-shape. Both, the upper and the lower flanges have the same thickness and they are centred on the y-axis of the position coordinate system.

DocAttribute.Name: FilletRadius
DocAttribute.Documentation: The fillet between the web and the flange, if not given, zero is assumed.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The thickness of the flange shall be less than half of the overall depth.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR2
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The web thickness shall be less then the overall width.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR3
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The FilletRadius, if given, should be within the range of allowed values.
